title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Create a detailed list of project requirements, including functional and non-functional requirements for the assistantFormationSimulation.

title: Design Real-time Interactive Simulation System Architecture
description: Outline the architecture for a real-time interactive simulation system that can be used in virtual reality for training purposes.

title: Develop Frontend for Interactive Simulation User Interface
description: Create the user interface for the interactive simulation system, ensuring it is easy to navigate and responsive.
dependencies: Design Real-time Interactive Simulation System Architecture

title: Develop Backend Services for Real-time Data Processing
description: Create the backend services needed to handle real-time data processing for the simulation.
dependencies: Design Real-time Interactive Simulation System Architecture

title: Integrate Virtual Reality Technology for Immersion
description: Incorporate VR technology to make the simulation immersive and more effective for training purposes.
dependencies: Design Real-time Interactive Simulation System Architecture

title: Test and Validate the Simulation System
description: Perform extensive testing to ensure that the simulation system works as intended.
dependencies: Develop Frontend for Interactive Simulation User Interface
Develop Backend Services for Real-time Data Processing
Integrate Virtual Reality Technology for Immersion

title: Deploy and Monitor the assistantFormationSimulation System
description: Deploy the system, monitor its performance, and address any issues that arise.
dependencies: Test and Validate the Simulation System
